QuestData.Title: Demons Among Us
QuestData.Description: Look around. What do you see?$B$B<Allari glares at something over your shoulder.>$B$BThe Legion has already infiltrated the Horde... even now, they are among you.$B$BWe must protect your Warchief.$B$BWhen you are ready to see what lies beneath the veil, say the word.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn what Allari the Souleater sees.

Objectives.Objective: Learn what Allari the Souleater knows
